name: Nightwalk
storyline:
IT ALL STARTED WHEN…
I was taking a walk in the night. Remembering the long strolls and talks with an old friend, how serene and enlighten the warm an peaceful summernight could be.

And now you find yourself on a hidden and quiet Island, glimmers of a shared past, and once again to remember and sense the long night and her manifold of beautiful phenomenas.
summary:
Take a walk on a hidden Island and experience the longest summer night to ever happen.

Peaceful and atmospheric first person walking game. Focusing around the mystery and beauty of a long summer night while the player explores a hidden island.
